name: El Guapo

ingredients.item: The Perfect Purée of Napa Valley El Corazon fruit purée

preparation:
This signature cocktail at The Box Social in Portland, Ore., is vividly rosy with a purée blend of passion fruit, blood orange and pomegranate.

This recipe originally appeared as part of “11 Hottest Cocktails to Drink in Bars Now: December 2017.”

Rim a highball glass with salt and pepper and set aside.

Add all the ingredients except the mezcal to a shaker with ice, and shake thoroughly.

Strain into a Highball glass filled with ice.

Garnish with an inverted 1/2 lime with the juice squeezed out (a lime boat).

Fill the lime boat with the mezcal.
